name: vamtiger-regex-period
description: A Regular Expression to Match a Period Character.

scripts.test: npm run test-bundle && mocha build/test --recursive && npm run clean
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm run build-types && vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/index.ts --bundleFilePath build/index.js --format cjs --sourcemap true --minify --copySourceMap
scripts.test-bundle: npm run test-build && npm run test-build-types && vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/index.ts --bundleFilePath build/index.js --format cjs --sourcemap true --minify --copySourceMap
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run build-types && vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/index.ts --bundleFilePath build/index.js --format cjs --sourcemap true --minify --copySourceMap --watch
scripts.test-watch: npm run test-build && npm run test-build-types && vamtiger-bundle-typescript --relativePath --entryFilePath source/index.ts --bundleFilePath build/index.js --format cjs --sourcemap true --minify --copySourceMap --watch

author: Vamtiger Immortalles
